name: Ninja Sukafu
summary: Ninja Sukafu is a short action platform game in which you control the Sukafu ninja, whose mission is to retrieve the King's lost chicken. Face challenging stages in 3 unique scenarios with different gameplays. Mountain: Overcome platforms and mountain ranges to reach the end of the levels. Forest: Use your ninja stars to face enemies and win challenges. Volcano: With an endless runner mechanic you must reach the temple portal in a procedurally generated stage.
